Name: ama
Overview: Automated Music Archiver :: This script will automatically archive music using a popular online DL Client

enableautomaticscriptstart.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
enableautomaticscriptstart.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

scriptinterval.Name: Script Interval
scriptinterval.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

dlclientarltoken.Name: DL Client ARL Token
dlclientarltoken.Description: User token for dl client, for instructions to obtain token: https://notabug.org/RemixDevs/DeezloaderRemix/wiki/Login+via+userToken

downloadmode.Name: Download Mode
downloadmode.Description: artist or discography :: artist mode downloads all albums listed as that artist, discography downloads all albums listed as that artist and featured in albums

relatedartist.Name: Related Artist
relatedartist.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this lets the script crawl your artist list for related artists and process them

relatedartist-relatedartist(loop).Name: Related Artist -> Related Artist (loop)
relatedartist-relatedartist(loop).Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this lets the script crawl your related artists for additional related artists and process them accordingly :: WARNING this will cause an endless loop (spider crawling) until no more are found...

artistrelatedcount.Name: Artist Related Count
artistrelatedcount.Description: Maximum number of related artists to import per artist (20 is max)

artistfancount.Name: Artist Fan Count
artistfancount.Description: Minimum number of fans required for processing

format.Name: Format
format.Description: SET TO: ALAC or FLAC or AAC or MP3 or OPUS

conversionbitrate.Name: Conversion Bitrate
conversionbitrate.Description: FLAC -> OPUS/AAC/MP3 will be converted using this bitrate

forceconvert.Name: Force Convert
forceconvert.Description: true = enabled :: This will convert lossy MP3 to desired target format (exluding FLAC/ALAC, ALAC setting will convert to AAC)

musicpostprocessthreads.Name: Music Post Process Threads
musicpostprocessthreads.Description: Controls number of threads used for Format conversion and replaygain tagging

musicembeddedcoverquality.Name: Music Embedded Cover Quality
musicembeddedcoverquality.Description: Controls the quality of the cover image compression in percentage, 100 = no compression

albumtypefilter.Name: Album Type Filter
albumtypefilter.Description: Filter Types: COMPILE, SINGLE, ALBUM, EP (this is a ', ' separated list of Album Types to skip)

musicrequirequality.Name: Music Require Quality
musicrequirequality.Description: true = enabled :: Requires all downloaded files match target file extension (mp3 or flac) when enabled

musicreplaygaintagging.Name: Music Replaygain Tagging
musicreplaygaintagging.Description: true = enabled :: Scans and analyzes files to add replaygain tags to song metadata

removeartsitwithoutimage.Name: Remove Artsit Without Image
removeartsitwithoutimage.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this will prevent downloading albums from artists with default image (non-unique)

completemyartists.Name: Complete My Artists
completemyartists.Description: true = enabled :: Eanabling this will add artist id's found in the library directory that are currently not in your list. This will then allow the script archive them accordingly :: !!!WARNING!!! Could cause an endless loop!

lidarrlistimport.Name: Lidarr List Import
lidarrlistimport.Description: true = enabled :: imports artist list from lidarr

lidarrurl.Name: Lidarr Url
lidarrurl.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...

lidarrapikey.Name: Lidarr API Key
lidarrapikey.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...

plexscannotifications.Name: Plex Scan Notifications
plexscannotifications.Description: true = enabled :: Plex must have a Music library added and also be configured with the /downloads-ama directory

plexlibraryname.Name: Plex Library Name
plexlibraryname.Description: This must exactly match the name of the Plex Library that contains the Lidarr Media Folder data

plexurl.Name: Plex Url
plexurl.Description: ONLY used if NOTIFYPLEX is enabled...

plextoken.Name: Plex Token
plextoken.Description: ONLY used if NOTIFYPLEX is enabled...
